snippet.title: Boris the Sloth : Official Trailer #3
snippet.description:
Channel your inner sloth in this challenging nature-based puzzle platforming adventure game. Transition between the world of the living and the spirit realm where you will use your abilities to move objects, alter gravity, and warp time in order to solve puzzles and fight off dangerous animals.

'Boris the Sloth' is a solo indie game project developed by myself and I hope you enjoy!

Download the game here: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.clutchdynamicsgames.boristhesloth
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/boris-the-sloth/id1589884472
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1789500/Boris_the_Sloth/
